product_name: MaryJanesFarm Organic Curry In A Hurry - Single Serving
long_description: MaryJanesFarm Organic Curry In A Hurry is a tangy blend of rice, lentils, cheese and curry, loaded with protein to give you the energy needed to make it through those long hikes.
short_description: MaryJanesFarm Organic Curry In A Hurry is a tangy blend of rice, lentils, cheese and curry, loaded with protein to give you the energy needed to make it through those long hikes.
